result.execSummary:
Paul Edward Chatfield III was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Paul Edward Chatfield III was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Valerie A Zisman in court.  Jodi D Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Extradited.

Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield in court with attorney Valerie A Zisman.  Gwanny J Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives Extraditon freely & voluntarily,  Further proceedings scheduled for June 11, 2014 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Paul Edward Chatfield in court in custody with attorney Valerie A Zisman.  Richard J Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed; Copy to Deft; Rights given; Reading waived.  Cash bond of $30,000 set.  Extradition Hearing scheduled for 05-13-2014 at 02:00 pm.
